title: Bahrain, UAE Blast Up First Major Summit Finish of 2025, But Vacek Stands Firm
content:
Bahrain Victorious go 1-2 at 2025's first mountain summit finish at the Volta a Valenciana, but Mathias Vacek held firm in the GC battle.

Read the full article at Bahrain, UAE Blast Up First Major Summit Finish of 2025, But Vacek Stands Firm on Velo.
author: ahood
